name: Astral Eclipse
description: <bulletlist>Global Effects:<bullet><mana></mana> Mana income is reduced by -30%.</bullet><bullet>World Map Spells cost +50% <caststrategic></caststrategic> <hyperlink>World Map Casting Points</hyperlink>.</bullet></bulletlist>

name: Blightfall Conjunction
description: <bulletlist>Global Effects:<bullet><hyperlink>Cities</hyperlink> lose -5 <food></food> Food per <population></population> Population.</bullet><bullet>Blightfall is active in combat: Each turn in combat a random unit takes 15 <damageblight></damageblight> <hyperlink>Blight Damage</hyperlink> and becomes inflicted with Diseased.</bullet></bulletlist>

name: Colossus Moon
description: <bulletlist>Global Effects:<bullet>Provinces turn into Swamps around the world.</bullet><bullet>Thunder Storms is active in combat: Each turn in combat all units become Wet and 1 random unit takes 20 <damagelightning></damagelightning> <hyperlink>Lightning Damage</hyperlink>.</bullet></bulletlist>

name: Dawn Of The Lodestar (Order)
description: <bulletlist>Global Effects:<bullet>Celestial units and units with Faithful or Zeal gain Angelic Potential, granting: +2 <statuseffectresistance></statuseffectresistance> <hyperlink>Status Resistance</hyperlink> and +20 <happiness></happiness> <hyperlink>Morale</hyperlink>.</bullet><bullet><hyperlink>Free Cities</hyperlink> spawn armies to attack their targets.</bullet><bullet>For the rest of the game, all units have -2 <defensespirit></defensespirit> <hyperlink>Spirit Resistance</hyperlink>.</bullet></bulletlist>

name: Eye Of Fire (Chaos)
description: <bulletlist>Global Effects:<bullet>Fiend and Demonkin units gain Demonic Potential, granting: Base attacks have a 30% chance to inflict a random negative status effect, this effect is doubled for non-repeating attacks.</bullet><bullet><hyperlink>Free Cities</hyperlink> lose -10 <hyperlink>Relations</hyperlink> per <turn></turn> Turn and are able to declare war on their overlords when at <hyperlink>Vassalage</hyperlink> or lower.</bullet><bullet>For the rest of the game, all units have -2 <defensefire></defensefire> <hyperlink>Fire Resistance</hyperlink>.</bullet></bulletlist>

name: Starry-eyed Enlightenment
description: <bulletlist>Global Effects:<bullet><hyperlink>Cities</hyperlink> gain +100% <knowledge></knowledge><hyperlink>Knowledge</hyperlink> income.</bullet><bullet>Declaring wars is always Unjust.</bullet><bullet>Ending wars grants 200 <influence></influence><hyperlink>Imperium</hyperlink>.</bullet></bulletlist>

name: Ravenous Visitants
description: <bulletlist>Global Effects:<bullet>Armies of hostile astral creatures appear across the world.</bullet><bullet>Ethereal units gain Attunement: Enhancement, granting: Whenever a spell is cast, this unit gains a random positive status effect.</bullet></bulletlist>

name: Melenis's Kiss
description: <bulletlist>Global Effects:<bullet>All units have a 30% chance of turning slain non-Undead units into Zombies under your control which stay after combat. These Zombies cannot regenerate <hp></hp> <hyperlink>Hit Points</hyperlink>.</bullet></bulletlist>

name: Phase-shift Nixing
description: <bulletlist>Global Effects:<bullet>Teleporter province improvements, Teleportation spells, and Teleportation abilities are disabled. Phasing units cannot use teleporting abilities.</bullet></bulletlist>

name: Rays Of Winter
description: <bulletlist>Global Effects:<bullet>Provinces turn into Arctic around the world.</bullet><bullet>Arctic Blizzards is active in combat: Every turn in combat, all units take 8 <damagefrost></damagefrost> <hyperlink>Frost Damage</hyperlink> damage and all Wet units have a 90% chance of becoming Frozen.</bullet><bullet>Units on Arctic provinces suffer from -5 <hp></hp> <hyperlink>Hit Point</hyperlink> regeneration per <turn></turn> Turn and -2  <hyperlink>Vision Range</hyperlink>.</bullet></bulletlist>

name: Sign of the Cleft Shield
description: <bulletlist>Global Effects:<bullet>Shield units gain Sign of the Cleft Shield, granting: +40% damage and -4 <defense></defense> Defense.</bullet></bulletlist>

name: Sign Of The Huntress
description: <bulletlist>Global Effects:<bullet>Ranged, Battle Mage, and Support units gain Sign of the Huntress, granting: +30% damage and -1 <range></range> range.</bullet></bulletlist>

name: Sign Of The Lumbering Staff
description: <bulletlist>Global Effects:<bullet>Battle Mage and Support units gain Sign of the Lumbering Staff, granting: +1 <range></range> range and Slow Movement in combat.</bullet></bulletlist>

name: Sign Of The Vanguard
description: <bulletlist>Global Effects:<bullet>Shock units gain Sign of the Vanguard, granting:<bullet>Very Fast Movement in combat.</bullet><bullet><hyperlink>Magic</hyperlink> and <hyperlink>Physical Ranged</hyperlink> attacks against this unit have -20% <hyperlink>Accuracy</hyperlink>.</bullet><bullet><hyperlink>Melee</hyperlink> attacks deal -20% damage.</bullet></bulletlist>

name: Cosmic Winds
description: <bulletlist>Global Effects:<bullet>Provinces turn into Deserts around the world.</bullet><bullet>Blinding Sands is active in combat: Each turn in combat, each unit has a 60% chance of becoming Blind for 1 <turn></turn> Turn.</bullet></bulletlist>

name: Invading Sylviculture
description: <bulletlist>Global Effects:<bullet>A World Tree seedling causes forests to spread into adjacent provinces.</bullet><bullet>Grasping Vines is active in combat: Every 2 turns in combat, all units have a 50% chance of becoming Immobilized for 1 <turn></turn> Turn.</bullet><bullet>Units on Forest provinces suffer from -5 <hp></hp> <hyperlink>Hit Point</hyperlink> regeneration per <turn></turn> Turn and -2 <hyperlink>Vision Range</hyperlink>.</bullet></bulletlist>

name: Stirring Stone Conjunction
description: <bulletlist>Global Effects:<bullet><hyperlink>Cities</hyperlink> gain +100% <structureprod></structureprod> <hyperlink>Production</hyperlink> income.</bullet><bullet>All units have Siege Breaker.</bullet></bulletlist>

name: Sunstruck Eruptions
description: <bulletlist>Global Effects:<bullet>Provinces turn into Desolate around the world.</bullet><bullet><bulletlist>Volcanic Eruptions is active in combat:<bullet>Each turn in combat, 1-3 markers are placed. Then, after 1 <turn></turn> Turn the ground will erupt and units within 1 <range></range> range of the marker will suffer 10 <damagephysical></damagephysical> <hyperlink>Physical Damage</hyperlink> and 10 <damagefire></damagefire> <hyperlink>Fire Damage</hyperlink>.</bullet><bullet>Random affected hexes will become <hyperlink>On Fire</hyperlink>.</bullet></bulletlist></bullet></bulletlist>

name: Toll Of Seasons
description: Mysterious Fey folk appear from the mists to attack the cities of the unwary.

name: Drifting Ley Lines (Astral)
description: <bulletlist>Global Effects:<bullet>Magic Origin units gain Magic Origin Potential, granting: Attacks inflict Sundered Resistance and gain +5 <casttactical></casttactical> <hyperlink>Combat Casting Points</hyperlink> at the start of combat.</bullet><bullet>Combat spells are always <hyperlink>Overcharged</hyperlink> the first time they are cast each combat.</bullet><bullet>For the rest of the game, all units have -2 <defenselightning></defenselightning> <hyperlink>Lightning Resistance</hyperlink>.</bullet></bulletlist>

name: Portent of Rousing
description: <bulletlist>Global Effects:<bullet>All units gain Portent of Rousing, granting: Unit Upkeep is reduced by 50%.</bullet><bullet><hyperlink>Cities</hyperlink> gain +100% <unitprod></unitprod> <hyperlink>Draft</hyperlink> income.</bullet><bullet>At the end of the happening, gain 20 <gold></gold> <hyperlink>Gold</hyperlink> for each unit in your empire.</bullet></bulletlist>
